name: Excalibur (itch)
description:
In Excalibur, you play as not the hero, but the hero's sword! 

Hold down the mouse to aim your attack, release to slash up enemies!

Press R to go back to the main menu.

There seems to be an issue with transitioning back to the main menu after beating the boss. Once you've walked out of the boss room, the game is over.

--

This is the first game I've ever made outside of following tutorials to the letter. It's pretty rough, but I'm still very proud of it. Here's hoping I was able to get all of the kinks out before submitting!
